column4:
['Yun chaal chalo na matwali', '
Is dil pe qayaamat aati hai', '
Yun chaal chalo na matwali', '
Is dil pe qayaamat aati hai', '
Naagin ko bhi dhokhaa', '
Hota hai jab teri kamar haay haay', '
Jab teri kamar balakhati hai', '
Yun chaal chalo na matwali', 'Shaanon pe gira do zulfon ko', '
Dopahar ki garmi kya shay hai', '
Shaanon pe gira do zulfon ko', '
Dopahar ki garmi kya shay hai', '
Suraj pe siyaahi chhaa jaae jab', '
Zulf teri taubaa taubaa', '
Jab zulf teri laharaati hai', '
Yun chaal chalo na matwali', '
Sab jhuth', 'Yun ham pe hasna thik nahin', '
Duniyaa ki nazar lag jaaegi', '
Yun ham pe hasna thik nahin', '
Duniyaa ki nazar lag jaaegi', '
Koi phul samajh kar chum', '
Na le jab teri hansi waah waah', '
Jab teri hansi khil jaati', '
Hai yun chaal chalo na matwali', '
Lo nahin hansate', 'Qurbaan nahin ke kahane par', '
Aise hi zubaan se haan kah do', '
Qurbaan nahin ke kahane par', '
Aise hi zubaan se haan kah do', '
Chhota saa ye lafz e', '
Mohabbat hai tasqin badi', '
Allaah tasqin badi mil jaati hai', '
Yun chaal chalo na matwali', '
Is dil pe qayaamat aati hai', '
Yun chaal chalo na matwali.']
